General Information About the MFH Program
The Medical Foster Home (MFH) Program is a non-institutional alternative to nursing home care for Veterans that are unable to safely live alone due to chronic or terminal illness.
Note
:
Eligible Veterans must bear the cost of residing at an MFH.  However, the cost is less than the amount traditional nursing homes charge.
Reference
:  For more information on MFHs, see
38 CFR 17.73
, and
38 CFR 3.278
.
